meta.name: description
meta.content: The purpose of the Jackson County School District is to prepare all students for success as educated and caring citizens by inspiring and building good character and a passion for lifelong learning

article.aria-label: End of Fourth 9 Week Grading Period

h3.a: End of Fourth 9 Week Grading Period
Meal Program Updates/WiFi Location Availability---Click on "Read Full Story" for more information (Updated 4/19/20)

div.div: Mr. Moore is working closely with our local Health Department to help safeguard our students. Please watch this informational video on ways in which you can help stop the spread of illness.
This is the new instructional calendar for 2020-2021.
Please click here for information concerning School Choice Open Enrollment for Jackson County Schools---Deadline: March 31st, 2020

h3.a: Jackson County School District Press Release
2018-19 School, District and State Report Cards

div.div: The department is pleased to announce the release of the 2018-19 School, District and State Report Cards in the EduData Portal (http://edudata.fldoe.org). These report cards serve as a valuable resource for parents, educators and stakeholders by offering greater transparency into how Florida’s districts and schools are doing with regard to student achievement and success.
